Description:
1 x Improvement Notice IN/SGA/250322/RG/02 - You as a contractor have failed ensure that, so far as is reasonably practicable, suitable and sufficient sanitary conveniences and washing facilities in the immediate vicinity which include a supply of clean hot and cold or warm running water, as required by Schedule 2 of the Construction (Design and Management) Regulations 2015.

1 x Prohibition Notice PN/SGA/250322/RG/01 - Workers are at risk of falling a distance likely to cause serious injury or death.
